cells.data:
-- digitToInt :: Char -> Int
on digitToInt(c)
    set oc to id of c
    if 48 > oc or 102 < oc then
        missing value
    else
        set dec to oc - (id of "0")
        set hexu to oc - (id of "A")
        set hexl to oc - (id of "a")
        if 9 ≥ dec then
            dec
        else if 0 ≤ hexu and 5 ≥ hexu then
            10 + hexu
        else if 0 ≤ hexl and 5 ≥ hexl then
            10 + hexl
        else
            missing value
        end if
    end if
end digitToInt
